site.description: The Orc programming language plug-in for the Eclipse IDE (Integrated Development Environment). Provides editing, parsing, building, and execution services for the Orc programming language in Eclipse. Orc is a structured concurrent programming language.

category-def.name: Orc programming language
category-def.label: Orc programming language
category-def.description: The Orc programming language, a structured concurrent programming language, from The University of Texas at Austin.
